channel.title: A very bad javascript game: minecraft mining
channel.description:
Play the game: http://www.rscharts.com/game/
[b]General notes:[/b] OPM = Ores Per Minute KPE = Kills Per Enemy
[b]Update 11/28/2013[/b] [*] Rewrote some functions that will ease the process of adding new bosses. [*] Zombie boss now has a "continue" button. [*] Portal added. Collect parts from winning battles against Don Chikolio, or you can partner with him to receive a few immediately. [*] You now receive money for winning battles. [*] Two new pickaxes, Heavenly Pickaxe and Hell Pickaxe (credits to Thiefking for designs). [*] A new heavenly miner and heavenly soldier. [*] New ores. [*] Stats tab now added. [*] Bug fixes.

item.title: A very bad javascript game: minecraft mining
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:171, topic:536132”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=654940.msg4412321#msg4412321 date=1394289432]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=654940.msg4412293#msg4412293 date=1394276297]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=654940.msg4412292#msg4412292 date=1394276101]

OP is reporting his topic for us to delete it, I’m not going to unless he gives us a reason.
[/quote]Why wouldn’t you follow someone’s request?
[/quote]Why would I? We’ve never deleted topics on request. Locking, maybe, but even then they usually provide a reason. He literally just said ‘DELETE THIS MODS’

Because he wants it deleted and there’s no reason not to?
[/quote]The policy has always been to not delete topics on request unless there is an actual reason to. Reason being it also removes posts by other people and there’s no reason to remove those.[/quote]Or you could just lock it and not have a brain fart.

Read full topic
